verses.verse: וְעָשָׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> Then wrought בְצַלְאֵ֨ל <S%H1212><s%> Bezaleel וְאָהֳלִיאָ֜ב <S%H171><s%> and Aholiab וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> and every אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man חֲכַם־ <S%H2450><s%> and every wise לֵ֗ב <S%H3820><s%> hearted אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whom נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> put יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD חָכְמָ֤ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וּתְבוּנָה֙ <S%H8394><s%> and understanding בָּהֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> in whom לָדַ֣עַת <S%H3045><s%> to know לַעֲשֹׂ֔ת <S%H6213><s%> how to work אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלֶ֖אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> all manner of work עֲבֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> for the service הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary לְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom צִוָּ֖ה <S%H6680><s%> had commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> according to all that the LORD

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בְּצַלְאֵל֮ <S%H1212><s%> Bezaleel וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and אָֽהֳלִיאָב֒ <S%H171><s%> and Aholiab וְאֶל֙ <S%H413><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man חֲכַם־ <S%H2450><s%> and every wise לֵ֔ב <S%H3820><s%> hearted אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> had put יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD חָכְמָ֖ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom בְּלִבּ֑וֹ <S%H3820><s%> in whose heart כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> everyone אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whose נְשָׂא֣וֹ <S%H5375><s%> stirred him up לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> [even] every one whose heart לְקָרְבָ֥ה <S%H7126><s%> to come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> unto the work לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <S%H6213><s%> to do אֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיִּקְח֞וּ <S%H3947><s%> And they received מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> of מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַתְּרוּמָה֙ <S%H8641><s%> all the offering אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הֵבִ֜יאוּ <S%H935><s%> had brought בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> which the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לִמְלֶ֛אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> for the work עֲבֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> of the service הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary לַעֲשֹׂ֣ת <S%H6213><s%> to make אֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> וְ֠הֵם <S%H1992><s%> like הֵבִ֨יאוּ <S%H935><s%> it [withal] And they brought אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> and ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still נְדָבָ֖ה <S%H5071><s%> yet unto him free offerings בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> every morning בַּבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> morning

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַ֣חֲכָמִ֔ים <S%H2450><s%> And all the wise men הָעֹשִׂ֕ים <S%H6213><s%> that wrought אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלֶ֣אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> all the work הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> every man אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> each מִמְּלַאכְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4399><s%> from his work אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like עֹשִֽׂים׃ <S%H6213><s%> which they made

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> And they spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying מַרְבִּ֥ים <S%H7235><s%> much more הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> The people לְהָבִ֑יא <S%H935><s%> bring מִדֵּ֤י <S%H1767><s%> than enough הָֽעֲבֹדָה֙ <S%H5656><s%> for the service לַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> of the work אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <S%H6213><s%> to make אֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> gave commandment מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וַיַּעֲבִ֨ירוּ <S%H5674><s%> was circulated ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> proclamation בַּֽמַּחֲנֶה֮ <S%H4264><s%> throughout the camp לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Let neither man וְאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> nor woman אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no יַעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> make ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> any מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> any more work לִתְרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> for the offering הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary וַיִּכָּלֵ֥א <S%H3607><s%> were restrained הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> So the people מֵהָבִֽיא׃ <S%H935><s%> from bringing

וְהַמְּלָאכָ֗ה <S%H4399><s%> For the stuff הָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> had דַיָּ֛ם <S%H1767><s%> they had was sufficient לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> for all the work לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to make אֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> וְהוֹתֵֽר׃ <S%H3498><s%> it and too much ס

וַיַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> among them that wrought כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All חֲכַם־ <S%H2450><s%> And every wise לֵ֜ב <S%H3820><s%> hearted man בְּעֹשֵׂ֧י <S%H6213><s%> made הַמְּלָאכָ֛ה <S%H4399><s%> the work אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten יְרִיעֹ֑ת <S%H3407><s%> curtains שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָ֗ר <S%H7806><s%> [of] fine twined וּתְכֵ֤לֶת <S%H8504><s%> and blue וְאַרְגָּמָן֙ <S%H713><s%> and purple וְתוֹלַ֣עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֔י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet כְּרֻבִ֛ים <S%H3742><s%> [with] cherubims מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> work חֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> of cunning עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> made אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

אֹ֜רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> The length הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָֽאַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> of one שְׁמֹנֶ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> and eight וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> [was] twenty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> four בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits הַיְרִיעָ֖ה <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> of one מִדָּ֥ה <S%H4060><s%> size אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> [were] all of one לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיְרִיעֹֽת׃ <S%H3407><s%> the curtains

וַיְחַבֵּר֙ <S%H2266><s%> And he coupled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> the five הַיְרִיעֹ֔ת <S%H3407><s%> curtains אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and אֶחָ֑ת <S%H376><s%> he וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and [the other] five יְרִיעֹת֙ <S%H3407><s%> curtains חִבַּ֔ר <S%H2266><s%> he coupled אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> unto another אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶחָֽת׃ <S%H376><s%> He

וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made לֻֽלְאֹ֣ת <S%H3924><s%> loops תְּכֵ֗לֶת <S%H8504><s%> of blue עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂפַ֤ת <S%H8193><s%> on the edge הַיְרִיעָה֙ <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> of one מִקָּצָ֖ה <S%H7098><s%> from the selvedge בַּמַּחְבָּ֑רֶת <S%H4225><s%> in the coupling כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> likewise עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> likewise he made בִּשְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> side הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <S%H3407><s%> of [another] curtain הַקִּ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה <S%H7020><s%> in the uttermost בַּמַּחְבֶּ֖רֶת <S%H4225><s%> in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> of the second

חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> Fifty לֻלָאֹ֗ת <S%H3924><s%> loops עָשָׂה֮ <S%H6213><s%> made בַּיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָאֶחָת֒ <S%H259><s%> he in one וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty לֻלָאֹ֗ת <S%H3924><s%> loops עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> made בִּקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> he in the edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <S%H3407><s%> of the curtain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after בַּמַּחְבֶּ֣רֶת <S%H4225><s%> which [was] in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִ֑ית <S%H8145><s%> of the second מַקְבִּילֹת֙ <S%H6901><s%> held הַלֻּ֣לָאֹ֔ת <S%H3924><s%> the loops אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> [curtain] to another

וַיַּ֕עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty קַרְסֵ֣י <S%H7165><s%> taches זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וַיְחַבֵּ֨ר <S%H2266><s%> and coupled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְרִעֹ֜ת <S%H3407><s%> the curtains אַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> unto another בַּקְּרָסִ֔ים <S%H7165><s%> with the taches וַֽיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> tabernacle אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> so it became one ס

וַיַּ֙עַשׂ֙ <S%H6213><s%> And he made יְרִיעֹ֣ת <S%H3407><s%> curtains עִזִּ֔ים <S%H5795><s%> [of] goats' לְאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> [hair] for the tent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> over the tabernacle עַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H6249><s%> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> ten יְרִיעֹ֖ת <S%H3407><s%> curtains עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> he made אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

אֹ֜רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> The length הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָאַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> of one שְׁלֹשִׁים֙ <S%H7970><s%> [was] thirty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וְאַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> and four אַמּ֔וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits רֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> [was] the breadth הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> curtain הָאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> of one מִדָּ֣ה <S%H4060><s%> size אַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> [were] of one לְעַשְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H6249><s%> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> ten יְרִיעֹֽת׃ <S%H3407><s%> curtains

וַיְחַבֵּ֛ר <S%H2266><s%> And he coupled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> five הַיְרִיעֹ֖ת <S%H3407><s%> curtains לְבָ֑ד <S%H905><s%> themselves וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> by themselves and six הַיְרִיעֹ֖ת <S%H3407><s%> curtains לְבָֽד׃ <S%H905><s%> themselves

וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made לֻֽלָאֹ֣ת <S%H3924><s%> loops חֲמִשִּׁ֗ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <S%H3407><s%> of the curtain הַקִּיצֹנָ֖ה <S%H7020><s%> upon the uttermost בַּמַּחְבָּ֑רֶת <S%H4225><s%> in the coupling וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty לֻלָאֹ֗ת <S%H3924><s%> loops עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> made עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> he upon the edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <S%H3407><s%> of the curtain הַחֹבֶ֖רֶת <S%H2279><s%> which coupleth הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> the second

וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made קַרְסֵ֥י <S%H7165><s%> taches נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> [of] brass חֲמִשִּׁ֑ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty לְחַבֵּ֥ר <S%H2266><s%> together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tent לִהְיֹ֥ת <S%H1961><s%> become אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> that it might be one

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made מִכְסֶה֙ <S%H4372><s%> a covering לָאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> for the tent עֹרֹ֥ת <S%H5785><s%> skins אֵלִ֖ים <S%H352><s%> [of] rams' מְאָדָּמִ֑ים <S%H119><s%> dyed red וּמִכְסֵ֛ה <S%H4372><s%> and a covering עֹרֹ֥ת <S%H5785><s%> skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <S%H8476><s%> [of] badgers' מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> above ס

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקְּרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H7175><s%> boards לַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> for the tabernacle עֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֖ים <S%H7848><s%> [of] shittim עֹמְדִֽים׃ <S%H5975><s%> standing up

עֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> [was] ten אַמֹּ֖ת <S%H520><s%> cubits אֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> The length הַקָּ֑רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> of a board וְאַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> cubit וַחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> and a half הָֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits רֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <S%H7175><s%> of a board הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one

שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> had two יָדֹ֗ת <S%H3027><s%> tenons לַקֶּ֙רֶשׁ֙ <S%H7175><s%> board הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> One מְשֻׁלָּבֹ֔ת <S%H7947><s%> equally distant אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> from אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> another כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> thus עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> thus did he make לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> for all קַרְשֵׁ֥י <S%H7175><s%> for all the boards הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle
